verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָ֡הּ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD הַלְלִ֥י <WH1984> hal-Li Praise נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

אֲהַלְלָ֣ה <WH1984> 'a-hal-Lah will I praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <WH2416> be-chai-Yai; While I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Rah I will sing praises לֵֽאלֹהַ֣י <WH430> le-lo-Hai unto my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5750> be-'o-Di. while

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּבְטְח֥וּ <WH982> tiv-te-Chu Put not your trust בִנְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> vin-di-Vim; in princes בְּבֶן־ <WH1121> be-ven- [nor] in the son אָדָ֓ם׀ <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שֶׁ֤אֵֽין <WH369> She-'ein there ל֥וֹ lo תְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH8668> te-shu-'Ah. in whom [there is] no help

תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> te-Tze goeth forth ר֭וּחוֹ <WH7307> ru-cho His breath יָשֻׁ֣ב <WH7725> ya-Shuv he returneth לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ <WH127> le-'ad-ma-To; to his earth בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom in that very day הַ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he אָבְד֥וּ <WH6> 'a-ve-Du perish עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6250> 'esh-to-no-Tav. his thoughts

אַשְׁרֵ֗י <WH835> 'ash-Rei, Happy שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל <WH410> she-'El [is he] that [hath] the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ <WH5828> be-'ez-Ro; for his help שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ <WH7664> ve-Ro, whose hope עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is in יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] in the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav. his God

עֹשֶׂ֤ה׀ <WH6213> 'o-Seh Which made שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz, and earth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> hai-Yam the sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after בָּ֑ם Bam; הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> hash-sho-Mer and all that therein [is] which keepeth אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> 'e-Met truth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. for ever

עֹשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh Which executeth מִשְׁפָּ֨ט׀ <WH4941> mish-Pat judgment לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים <WH6231> la-'a-shu-Kim, for the oppressed נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> no-Ten which giveth לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem food לָרְעֵבִ֑ים <WH7457> la-re-'e-Vim; to the hungry יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מַתִּ֥יר <WH5425> mat-Tir looseth אֲסוּרִֽים׃ <WH631> 'a-su-Rim. the prisoners

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ <WH6491> po-Ke-ach openeth עִוְרִ֗ים <WH5787> 'iv-Rim, [the eyes of] the blind יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD זֹקֵ֣ף <WH2210> zo-Kef raiseth כְּפוּפִ֑ים <WH3721> ke-fu-Fim; them that are bowed down יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> 'o-Hev loveth צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim. the righteous

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר <WH8104> sho-Mer preserveth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גֵּרִ֗ים <WH1616> ge-Rim, the strangers יָת֣וֹם <WH3490> ya-Tom the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> ve-'al-ma-Nah and widow יְעוֹדֵ֑ד <WH5749> ye-'o-Ded; he relieveth וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> ve-De-rech but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked יְעַוֵּֽת׃ <WH5791> ye-'av-Vet. he turneth upside down

יִמְלֹ֤ךְ <WH4427> yim-Loch shall reign יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, for ever אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ <WH430> 'e-lo-Ha-yich [even] thy God צִ֭יּוֹן <WH6726> Tzi-yon O Zion לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> le-Dor unto all וָדֹ֗ר <WH1755> va-Dor, generations הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
